Struct setup_error

boost::unit_test::framework::setup_error — This exception type is used to report test module setup errors.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/test/framework.hpp>


struct setup_error : public runtime_error {
  // construct/copy/destruct
  setup_error(const_string);
};

Description

  1. setup_error(const_string m);
